steps.name: user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter no data

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "" last name "" email "" password "" confirm pass ""
click REGISTER
error message with the required fields
user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter wrong email

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "m" last name "m" email "m" password "123456" confirm pass "123456"
click REGISTER
wrong email message
user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter password less than 6 characters

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "m" last name "m" email "m@m.m" password "123" confirm pass "123"
click REGISTER
error the password should be at least 6 characters
user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter confirm password don't match the password

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "m" last name "m" email "m@m.m" password "123456" confirm pass "7891011"
click REGISTER
error confirm password don't match the password
user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter valid information

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "mahmoud" last name "ali" email "mahmoudali@example.com" password "password" confirm pass "password"
click REGISTER
registered successfully then click on logout
user open browser and navigates to home page for registration

elements.name: user enter already existing email

steps.name: user navigate to register page and enter first name "mahmoud" last name "ali" email "mahmoudali@example.com" password "123456" confirm pass "123456"
click REGISTER
error already registered email

name: new user should register to the website successfully

steps.name: user open browser and navigates to home page

elements.name: user enter no data

steps.name: user navigate to login page and enter email "" password ""
user click on login button
error message please enter email
user open browser and navigates to home page

elements.name: user login with invalid email and password

steps.name: user navigate to login page and enter email "m@m.m" password "invalid"
user click on login button
error message login was unsuccessful
user open browser and navigates to home page

elements.name: user enter invalid email format

steps.name: user navigate to login page and enter email "m" password ""
user click on login button
error message wrong email
user open browser and navigates to home page

elements.name: user login with valid email and password

steps.name: user navigate to login page and enter email "mahmoudali@example.com" password "password"
user click on login button
user log in successfully and redirected to homepage

name: user should be able to login successfully

steps.name: user open browser then navigate to home page

elements.name: unauthenticated user could switch between currencies

steps.name: user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro
user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar
user open browser then navigate to home page

elements.name: new registered user could switch between currencies

steps.name: user click on register from top menu
enter first name "mahmoud" last name "ali" email "mahmoudd@ali1.com" password "password" confirm pass "password"
press REGISTER
user click on continue button
user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro
user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar
user open browser then navigate to home page

elements.name: authenticated user could switch between currencies

steps.name: user click on login button then enter email "mahmoudd@ali1.com" password "password"
press login button
user select "Euro" then the featured product prices is switched to Euro
user select "US Dollar" then the featured product prices is switched US dollar

name: user should be able to switch between currencies

steps.name: open browser and go to home page

elements.name: unauthenticated user can search products

steps.name: user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"
user is redirected to a page with no products
roll back to home
enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
roll back to home
enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
roll back to home
enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
quit the browser
open browser and go to home page

elements.name: newly registered can search product

steps.name: choose register from header
register "mahmoud" "ali" "mahmoud1@aali.com" "123456" "123456"
register and continue pressed
user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"
user is redirected to a page with no products
roll back to home
enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
roll back to home
enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
roll back to home
enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
quit the browser
open browser and go to home page

elements.name: authenticated can search product

steps.name: choose login from header
login  "mahmoud1@aali.com" "123456"
login pressed
user enter invalid product name as "bla bla"
user is redirected to a page with no products
enter valid product full name as "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
enter valid product partial name as "Apple" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
enter SKU: "AP_MBP_13" and click enter
user is redirected to a page contains "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch" product
quit the browser

name: user should be able to search product by name or SKU

steps.name: browser is opened and navigated to home page

elements.name: unauthenticated user hover all categories then select computers

steps.name: user hover all categories
click on all menu items
browser is opened and navigated to home page

elements.name: newly registered user hover all categories then select computers

steps.name: user click on register button from header menu
fill registration form with "mahmoud" "ali" "mahmoud@al1.com" "123456" "123456"
click REGISTER then click continue
user hover all categories
click on all menu items
browser is opened and navigated to home page

elements.name: authenticated user hover all categories then select computers

steps.name: user click on login button from header menu
fill login form with "mahmoud@al1.com" "123456"
click Login
user hover all categories
click on all menu items

name: user should be able to hover different categories and select any of them

user click slider control "2"

elements.name: user click on all follow us icons

steps.name: browser opened and redirected to home page
user click rss icon from the footer
user is redirected to rss then close
user click facebook icon from the footer
user is redirected to facebook then close
user click twitter icon from the footer
user is redirected to twitter then close
user click youtube icon from the footer
user is redirected to youtube then quit

name: user should click any icon to follow us and redirect fine to the selected platform

elements.name: user add product to wishlist from featured products and product categories

steps.name: browser open to home page
user scroll down to featured products and click "Build your own computer" product
user click on add to wishlist button from featured product details page
go back to home page
user click on digital downloads from product category top menu
click on "If You Wait (donation)" product
user click on add to wishlist button from category product details page
go back to home page
user select wishlist
check "Build your own computer" and "If You Wait (donation)"  products are added to wish list and quit

name: user can add product to wishlist successfully

elements.name: user add product to cart from featured products and product categories

steps.name: browser navigated to home page
user scroll to featured products and click "Build your own computer" product
user click on add to cart button from featured product details page
navigate to home page
user click on digital downloads from product category menu
click "If You Wait (donation)" product
user click on add to cart button from category product details page
navigate to home page
user select shopping cart
check "Build your own computer" and "If You Wait (donation)"  products are added and quit

name: user can add product to cart successfully
